title: namakkoru kuraiyEdu
sahitya:
namakkoru kuraiyEdu tiruppazhani nAthanaruL irukkum pOdini


anupallavi

  umaikkoru maghanAi uditta guhanaruLAl tavattaruL varumini shAntamE vAindiDum


caraNam    dEvar tuyar keDa asurarai mAippavan shelva mayilil vandE aDiyAraik-kAppavan 
yAvarkkum innaruL engumE nallinbam Iyum avan malar iNaiyaDi pOTri vAzh
